verses.verse: <S%G2532>And<s%> I <S%G1125>wrote<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> very <S%G846>thing<s%> to <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G3361>so<s%> <S%G2064>that,<s%> when I came, I <S%G2192>wouldn't<s%> have <S%G3077>sorrow<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> them of <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G3165>I<s%> <S%G1163>ought<s%> to <S%G5463>rejoice;<s%> having <S%G3982>confidence<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G3956>all,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G1699>my<s%> <S%G5479>joy<s%> would be <S%G2076>shared<s%> by <S%G3956>all<s%> of <S%G5216>you.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G2347>affliction<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4928>anguish<s%> of <S%G2588>heart<s%> I <S%G1125>wrote<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G1223>with<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G1144>tears,<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> you should be made <S%G3076>sorry,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> you might <S%G1097>know<s%> the <S%G26>love<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> I <S%G2192>have<s%> so <S%G4056>abundantly<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G5209>you.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> has caused <S%G3076>sorrow,<s%> he <S%G3076>has<s%> caused <S%G3076>sorrow,<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> to <S%G1691>me,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G575>in<s%> <S%G3313>part<s%> <S%G2443>(that<s%> I <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1912>press<s%> too <S%G1912>heavily<s%>) to <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G3956>all.<s%>
<S%G2425>Sufficient<s%> to such a <S%G5108>one<s%> is <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2009>punishment<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> was inflicted <S%G5259>by<s%> the <S%G4119>many;<s%>

so <S%G5620>that<s%> on the <S%G5121>contrary<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> should <S%G3123>rather<s%> <S%G5483>forgive<s%> him <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3870>comfort<s%> <S%G3381>him,<s%> lest by any means such a <S%G5108>one<s%> should be swallowed <S%G2666>up<s%> with his <S%G4053>excessive<s%> <S%G3077>sorrow.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> this <S%G5124>end<s%> I <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1125>wrote,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> I might <S%G1097>know<s%> the <S%G1382>proof<s%> of <S%G5216>you,<s%> <S%G1487>whether<s%> you <S%G2075>are<s%> <S%G5255>obedient<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> all <S%G3956>things.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G1161>I<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> forgive <S%G3739>whomever<s%> you <S%G5483>forgive<s%> <S%G5100>anything.<s%> <S%G2532%G99999>For<s%> <S%G1473>if<s%> indeed <S%G1473>I<s%> have forgiven <S%G1536>anything,<s%> I have <S%G5483>forgiven<s%> that <S%G3739>one<s%> for your <S%G1223%G99999>sakes<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4383>presence<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%>

<S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G4122>advantage<s%> may be gained <S%G5259>over<s%> us by <S%G4567>Satan;<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> we <S%G50>are<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G50>ignorant<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3540>schemes.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> when I <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G5174>Troas<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> the Good <S%G2098>News<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> when a <S%G2374>door<s%> was <S%G455>opened<s%> to <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%>

I <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G425>relief<s%> for <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> because <S%G3165>I<s%> <S%G3361>didn't<s%> <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G5103>Titus,<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G80>brother,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> taking <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G657>leave<s%> of <S%G846>them,<s%> I went <S%G1831>out<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3109>Macedonia.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G5485>thanks<s%> be to <S%G2316>God,<s%> who <S%G3842>always<s%> <S%G2358>leads<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> in triumph <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5319>reveals<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G2257>us<s%> the sweet <S%G3744>aroma<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1108>knowledge<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G5117>place.<s%>

<S%G3754>For<s%> we <S%G2070>are<s%> a sweet <S%G2175>aroma<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> to <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> those <S%G3588>who<s%> are <S%G4982>saved,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> those <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G622>perish;<s%>

to the <S%G3739%G99999>one<s%> a <S%G3744>stench<s%> from <S%G2288>death<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2288>death;<s%> <S%G1161><s%> to the <S%G3739>other<s%> a sweet <S%G3744>aroma<s%> from <S%G2222>life<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2222>life.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5101>Who<s%> is <S%G2425>sufficient<s%> <S%G4314>for<s%> these <S%G5023>things?<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> we <S%G2070>are<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> so <S%G4183>many,<s%> <S%G2585>peddling<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%> <S%G235>But<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G1505>sincerity,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> in the <S%G2714>sight<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2980>we<s%> speak <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>
